borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Erection of a front and rear roof extension; erection of a rear extension at second floor level, over part of the existing back addition; erection of a side infill extension at first floor level, including reconstruction of existing first floor rear extension; erection of a single storey rear extension to the side and rear of existing back addition, following demolition of the external single storey rear structure; installation of a rooflight to the side roofslope to existing front gable roof; installation of new double glazed windows to replace all existing windows including, re-sizing and replacement of 1no. window to the rear elevation, removal of 1no. existing window and installation of 1no. new obscure glazed window to the side elevation at first floor level; excavation of part of the front and rear gardens to form lightwells, including erection of metal railings around the perimeter of the front lightwell and walk on glass to the rear lightwell, in connection with the enlargement of existing basement; installation of new mosaic tiled pathway towards the main front entrance door at ground floor level; erection of a new low level brick built front boundary wall with metal railings on top, new brick piers and a new metal entrance gate following the removal of existing.
